name: CTA Btn list
description: Tracks progress towards a primary goal by displaying a breakdown of achievements by sub-category. Ideal for monitoring budgets, fitness goals, or project milestones. Features a call-to-action button.
examples: How much protein have I had today?
Show me my spending breakdown for this month.
What's the status of my ongoing projects?
How close am I to my reading goal for the year?

component_title.description: A brief summary of the content, expressed as a short phrase.

quick_list.description: A list for quick links or related actions, with 1 to 5 items.

text_cta.description: The text label for the Call-to-Action button.

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ item.list_content }}
